import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reservations-component', templateUrl: './reservations.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reservations.component.css'] }) export class ReservationsComponent { public currentCount = 0; public incrementCounter() { this.currentCount++; } }
